snippet: The Washington Post Company said Friday that net income doubled in the first three months of the year, even though advertising and education revenue declined.
abstract: Washington Post Company reports first-quarter net income of $31 million, up from $15.2 million in same period of 2011; revenue falls 7 percent, from to $972 million from $1.04 billion.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Post Company said Friday that net income doubled in the first three months of the year, even though advertising and education revenue declined.

headline.main: Income Rises, but Revenue Falls at Washington Post
headline.print_headline: Income Rises, but Revenue Falls at Washington Post
